species.name: diglett
descriptions: A Pokémon that lives underground. Because of its dark habitat, it is repelled by bright sunlight.
Around their crops, farmers plant the kind of tree that Diglett like to eat as a way of getting Diglett to plow the fields for them.
DIGLETT are raised in most farms. The reason is simple--wherever they burrow, the soil is left perfectly tilled for growing delicious crops.
If a Diglett digs through a field, it leaves the soil perfectly tilled and ideal for planting crops.
It burrows through the ground at a shallow depth. It leaves raised earth in its wake, making it easy to spot.

abilities.name: sand-veil
abilities.effect: Increases evasion to 1.25× during a sandstorm.  Protects against sandstorm damage.

abilities.name: tangling-hair
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon takes regular damage from a contact move, the attacking Pokémon's Speed lowers by one stage.

abilities.name: sand-force
abilities.effect: Strengthens rock, ground, and steel moves to 1.3× their power during a sandstorm.  Protects against sandstorm damage.
